/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape below. The street, a ribbon of gray, cuts through the heart of the city, flanked by buildings on both sides. These structures, varying in height and design, add a dynamic element to the scene.

On the left side of the street, trees stand tall, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete jungle. They line the street like silent sentinels, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side, light-colored buildings rise, their facades reflecting the sunlight. A few taller buildings punctuate the skyline, standing out against the blue sky.

The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting long shadows and bathing the scene in a warm, inviting light. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, as if the city is waiting for its inhabitants to return and bring it back to life.
